DOC.brief_title: Power Training Versus Strength Training Elderly
DOC.detailed_description: Three female group , homogenize age , body mass index physical activity level , form : control group ( GC : n=8 , 69±4 year old ) , strength training group ( GF : n=6 , 67±4 year old ) power train group ( GP , n=7 , 68±4 year old ) . No extra activity induce GC 's routine . Meanwhile , GF GP underwent 12 week strength power training , respectively , three weekly session . While GF perform exercise moderate speed ( 70-90 % 1RM ) , GP execute fast speed ( 40-60 % 1RM ) . A kinematic electromyographic gait evaluation , well balance functional capacity evaluation , conduct prior intervention period .
